item.title: 2017 Reserves And An Update On Market Expectations Through 2019
item.description: Methodology Analyzed thirty companies with significant operations in the Permian Basin. Calculated expected oil growth rates from the market through 2019. Sourced data from FactSet. Highlights Year-end proved reserves for Concho totaled ~841 MMboe which put the company in the top 10 in total reserves. Proved oil reserves made up ~60% of the total. Undeveloped reserves totaled ~253 MMboe, or 30% of the total. In contrast to the peer group, Pioneer only shows 8% of undeveloped reserves.
